title: Can a Poorly Designed Game Still Be Good? | Design Delve
description:
Join our Patreon for a week of Early Access to all of our Premium video series including Zero Punctuation, Cold Take, Extra Punctuation, Adventure is Nigh and more! Just $2/month with a 7 day free trial. ►► https://www.patreon.com/the_escapist

Hey folks, welcome to the reboot of Design Delve featuring an updated artstyle and more variety in topic choices all-related to video game design. Enjoy!

In today's episode J & Ludo delve deep into the design mines at Yahtzee's request to ask the question, "What is a good game?"
